attributes.additional_details: The Government to allow Excavations of another site, other than that of Battle Abbey.
attributes.background: This is an event of National importance, New evidence has come to light to in regard to the most famous Battle fought on British Soil

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We’re not sure what you want to happen. 

Looking after sites of historical or cultural interest and ancient monuments in Hastings is usually the responsibility of the East Sussex County Archaeologist. You can find out more about the archaeology team here:

https://www.eastsussex.gov.uk/environment/archaeology/about/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
